name: Soccer Emojis Nation
description:
Soccer Talk with Emojis!

When words just can’t express how you truly feel about all the amazing goals, near misses or BIG let downs during this Soccer match, use Soccer Emoji’s and you will never be at a lose for words ever again!

Express yourself the largest, most comprehensive Soccer emoji/sticker collection available in the App Store with over 100+ awesome emojis/animations to enjoy and share.

Available in the new iMessage App Store as well.

Features include
- Share 100+ Amazing Soccer Emojis/Stickers
- Share 90+ Awesome Soccer Animations
- Share 20+ Funny Animated Text Images
- Easy step-by-step instructions for installing and using the keyboard
- iMessage compatible
- Share any emoji/sticker to others who do not have the app
- Easily share the app with others - with one button press on the keyboard
- ALLOW FULL ACCESS NOTE: Do not worry, allowing permission for Full Access is required for all keyboards. We - DO NOT save any of your information.

You can still use the app, if you do not want to give us full access. You will download it from the iMessage App Store and can fully use all emoji as stickers.

Email us at support@mokoolsportsgames.com with any questions, or concerns you may have.

If you have a great idea for a NEW Soccer emoji, please email and share it with us!
